item.title: Police constable assaulted by sand mafia in Raichur
item.description: <![CDATA[Kalaburagi: A police constable was assaulted by sand mafia at Chanikalaparvi village in Manvi taluk of Raichur district.Laxman was assaulted while he was on his routine duty in the village. Upon noticing a tractor transporting sand illegal sand, Laxman signalled the driver to stop the vehicle. This provoked the driver, identified as Devraj, who subsequently attacked the constable.Laxman received treatment at Taluk Public Hospital, where taluk medical officer Sharanbasava attended to him. Accordi...]]>
item.author: Tnn
